DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 3, open-label, multicenter study is designed to compare the effects of exenatide and insulin glargine (LantusÂ® injection) on beta-cell function in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus using metformin.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Exenatide and Insulin Glargine in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of type 2 diabetes, but otherwise healthy HbA1c between 6.6% and 9.5%, inclusive. Body mass index (BMI) of 25 kg/m2 to 40 kg/m2, inclusive. Treated with a stable dose of metformin for at least 2 months prior to screening. Patients previously in a study using exenatide. Treated with oral antidiabetic medications other than metformin within 2 months of screening (thiazolidinediones within 5 months of screening). Treated with insulin within 3 months of screening.
